action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath or Joel,

Can we make a couple of tweaks on the Nuplas site?

We've been running volume discounts since the beginning of times. The plugin we are using doesn't make it very obvious however. Can we please make the design changes attached?

I've included the icon in the zip file attached. If you can create it with CSS then great, otherwise please try and use the SVG with PNG fall back.

If you know of a plugin that allows you to implement this easier just let me know. I can rework the graphic to suit the plugin, if required.

FYI, it should only be applied to products with volume discounts applied.

Kind regards,
Jamie





Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// A Level 1, 616 Balcombe Road, Black Rock, 3193 VIC
